name: Bone Vault
description:
Techdemo v. 0.01

Bone Vault is an atmospheric first-person pixel roguelike. 

This is a very early version of the game and a prototype to gather initial feedback. 

Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • Left mouse button - main weapon ability
  • Right mouse button - secondary ability
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Tab - Menu
  • Spacebar - Jump

Known Bugs:

Currently, there is a bug after the level is loaded it can happen that you end up outside the game world. If this happens via the menu with the tab key and load the main menu and restart again. 

Have fun playing!
